scripts.database:migrate: npm run d1 -- migrations apply DATABASE
scripts.database:create-mock: rm -f .wrangler/state/v3/d1/miniflare-D1DatabaseObject/*.sqlite* && CI=true npm run database:migrate -- --local && node ./frontend/mock-db/run.mjs
scripts.dev: export COMMIT_HASH=$(git rev-parse HEAD) && npm run build && npm run database:migrate -- --local && npm run pages -- dev frontend/dist --compatibility-date=2022-12-20
scripts.ci-dev-test-ui: npm run build && npm run database:create-mock && npm run pages -- dev frontend/dist --binding 'DOMAIN=0.0.0.0' 'INSTANCE_TITLE=Test Wildebeest' 'INSTANCE_DESCR=My Wildebeest Instance' 'ACCESS_AUTH_DOMAIN=0.0.0.0.cloudflareaccess.com' 'ACCESS_AUD=DEV_AUD' 'ADMIN_EMAIL=george@test.email' --compatibility-date=2022-12-20
scripts.deploy:init: npm run pages -- project create wildebeest && npm run d1 -- create wildebeest
scripts.deploy: npm run build && npm run database:migrate && npm run pages -- deploy frontend/dist --project-name=wildebeest

simple-git-hooks.pre-commit: npm exec --package npm-run-all -- run-p lint pretty
